name: Info request
info:
Parameter Day and Offset
return array[5], number of tilt by category
0:Bon angle Bonne durée
1:Bon angle, durée trop courte
2:Mauvais angle, bonne duree
3:Non réalisé
4:Snoozé

name: Info request
info:
Parameter Day and Offset
return array[5], time passed in ms
0:Moins de 0
1:0 a 15
2:15 a 30
3:30 a 45
4:45 et plus

name: Datestamp for whole day
func:
var date = new Date(parseInt(msg.payload.Day))
msg.start = parseInt(date.setHours(0,0,0,0)/1000)
msg.end = parseInt(date.setHours(23,59,59,999)/1000)
return msg

name: Format data
Keep chairID only
Convert to percent
func:
msg.payload.slideProgress = []
msg.payload.slideProgress[0] = msg.payload.restPercent * 100.0
msg.payload.slideProgress[1] = msg.payload.travelPercent * 100.0
return msg;

func:

name: EventToQuery
EventToQuery
Merge
func:
msg.payload.calculatedTilts[3] += msg.payload.cancelledTilts
msg.payload.calculatedTilts[4] += msg.payload.snoozedTilts
msg.payload = msg.payload.calculatedTilts
return msg;

name: EventToQuery
EventToQuery
buffer
Merge
func:
msg.payload.calculatedTilts[3] += msg.payload.cancelledTilts
msg.payload.calculatedTilts[4] += msg.payload.snoozedTilts
msg.result[msg.index+1] = msg.payload.calculatedTilts
return msg;

name: Date data
format payload
Create Request
\n ->
func:
msg.payload = "

Log file

" + msg.payload.replace(/\n/g, "
") return msg;

msg.payload.time++
msg.payload.elapsed++
msg.payload.state = "NOTIFICATION_COMPLETE"
delete msg.payload._id
return msg;
